Text.val: 18.08.2009 AS SCR#14821 consolidated mgtools functions to mging.dll
Launch QuickView Plus and watch its screen coordinates
Identifier we add to Window title to identify QVP
We found QVP and gathered coordinates. Ask user if she wants to save this ...
Get information about top-level Window where the title starts
with the value we set for QVP
Running QVP NOT found. If it had been found before, the user closed it ...
extract information from flwintools return buffer with window info ...
Check for localized version of test document ....
Generate a test documen on the fly ...

ExpSyntax.val:
'

This document is displayed when Factorlink tries to gather the screen coordinates of QuickView Plus to store it in your settings.

'

'

Simply move QuickView around the screen and size it according to your wishes.'

' If finished, simply close QuickView Plus or switch back to Factorlink to save the coordinates. Next time Factorlink opens QuickView Plus to view a document, it will use these new screen coordinates.

'
